titleStmt.title: A satyre against seperatists, or, The conviction of chamber-preachers and other chismatickes contrary to the discipline of this our Protestant profession by A. C. Generosus.
titleStmt.author: Hausted, Peter, d. 1645.
Cowley, Abraham, 1618-1667.

notesStmt.note: A. C. Generosus is Peter Hausted. cf. BLC
Has been erroeously attributed to Abraham Cowley.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
